Translations.Text: mariyu a taruvata atani jati vari midaku, memu akasam nundi e sain'yanni pampaledu. Asalu maku sain'yanni pampe avasarame undadu
adi kevalam oka pedda dhvani matrame! Ante! Varanta (okesari) antam ceyabaddaru
a dasula gati enta socaniyamayinadi! Vari vaddaku e sandesaharudu vaccina, varu atanini egatali ceyakunda undaledu
Emi? Varu cudaleda (variki teliyada)? Variki mundu memu enno taralanu nasanam cesamani? Niscayanga, varu (vari purvikulu) ennatiki vari vaddaku tirigi raledu
kani varandarini kalipi okesari, ma mundu hajaru paracadam jarugutundi
mariyu vari koraku sucanaga jivam leni i bhumiye undi. Memu diniki pranam posi, dini nundi dhan'yam tistamu, danni varu tintaru
memu dinilo kharjurapu mariyu draksa vanalanu pencamu mariyu vatilo utalanu pravahimpajesamu
varu dini phalalanu tinataniki; mariyu idanta vari cetulu cesindi kadu. Ayina varu krtajnatalu telupara
bhumi nundi utpatti ayye anni vastuvulalo, jivulalo mariyu svayana varilo (manavulalo) inka variki teliyani vatilonu (ada-maga) jatalanu srstincina ayana (allah) lopalaku atitudu
mariyu vari koraku ma sucanalalo ratri okati; memu danipai nundi pagatini (velugunu) tolaginci nappudu, varini cikati avarincukuntundi
mariyu suryudu tana nirnita paridhilo, nirnita kalanlo payanistu untadu. Idi a sarvasaktimantuni, sarvajnuni niyamavali
mariyu candruni koraku memu dasalanu niyamincamu, civaraku atadu endina kharjurapu matta vale ayipotadu
candrunni andukovatam suryudi taram kadu. Mariyu ratri pagatini adhigaminca jaladu. Mariyu avanni tama tama kaksyalalo sancaristu untayi
variki maroka sucana emitante, niscayanga, memu vari santatini (nuh yokka) nindu nava loniki ekkincamu
mariyu memu varu ekki prayanam ceyataniki, ituvanti vatini enno srstincamu
mariyu memu korinatlayite, varini munci vese varamu; appudu vari kekalu vinevadevadu undadu mariyu varu raksimpabadanu leru
memu karuniste tappa - mariyu memu konta kalam varaku variki vyavadhiniste tappa

Mariyu varito: "Miru, mi mundunna daniki (ihaloka siksaku) mariyu mi venuka ranunna daniki (paraloka siksaku) bhitiparulai undandi, bahusa miru karunimpa badavaccu!" Ani annappudu, (varu laksyam ceyatam ledu)
mariyu vari prabhuvu sucanalalo nundi, vari vaddaku e sucana vaccina, varu dani nundi mukham trippukokunda undaledu

mariyu varito: "Allah miku prasadincina jivanopadhi nundi kharcu ceyandi." Ani annappudu, satyatiraskarulu visvasulato antaru: "Emi? Allah korite, tane tinipincagala variki, memu tinipincala? Miru spastamaina margabhrastatvanlo padi unnaru
varu inka ila antaru: "Miru satyavantule ayite, a vagdanam (punarut'thanam) eppudu purti kanunnadi
varu niriksistunnadi kevalam oka pedda dhvani korake. Mariyu varu vaduladukuntu undagane, adi varini cikkincukuntundi
varu e vidhamaina vilunama kuda vrayaleru mariyu tama kutumbam vari vaddaku kuda tirigi poleru
mariyu (marokasari) baka udabadi nappudu, varanta gorila nundi (leci) tama prabhuvu vaipunaku veganga parigettukuntu vastaru
varantaru: "Ayyo! Ma daurbhagyam! Mam'malni ma padakala nundi lepi evaru nilabettaru?" (Varito anabadutundi): "Ide a karunamayudu cesina vagdanam. Mariyu atani sandesaharulu satyame palikaru
adi kevalam oka pedda dhvani matrame ayi untundi! Ventane varanta ma mundu hajaru ceyabadataru
a roju evvariki elanti an'yayam jarugadu. Mariyu mi karmalaku taginadi tappa, mare pratiphalamivvabadadu
niscayanga, a roju svargavasulu sukhasantosalalo nimagnulai untaru
varu mariyu vari sahavasulu (ajvaj), callani nidalalo, anudu asanala mida hayiga kurconi untaru
andulo variki phalalu mariyu varu kore vanni untayi
Miku santi kalugugaka (salam)!" Ane palukulu apara karuna pradata ayina prabhuvu taraphu nundi vastayi
inka (ila anabadutundi): "O aparadhulara! Inadu miru verayi pondi
o adam santativaralara: 'Saitanunu aradhincakandi' ani nenu mim'malni adesincaleda? Niscayanga, atadu miku bahiranga satruvu
mariyu miru nanne aradhincandi. Ide rmargamani
mariyu vastavaniki vadu (saitan) milo pedda samuhanni dari tappincadu. Emi? Miku telivi leka poyinda
miku vagdanam ceyabadina a narakam ide
miru satyanni tiraskaristu unnanduku, i roju dinilo pravesincandi (kalandi)
a roju memu vari nolla mida mudra vestamu. Mariyu varemi arjincaro vari cetulu mato cebutayi mariyu vari kallu ma mundu saksyamistayi
mariyu memu korinatlayite, vari drstini nirmulince varamu, appudu varu dari koraku penugulade varu, kani varu ela cudagalige varu
mariyu memu korinatlayite, varini vari sthananlone rupanni marci unce varam, appudu varu munduku poleru mariyu venukaku maralaleru
mariyu memu evariki dirghayuvu nosangutamo, atani sariraka rupanni marcutamu. Emi? Varu idi kuda grahincalera
mariyu memu ataniki (muham'mad ku) kavitvam nerpaledu. Mariyu adi ataniki sobhincadu kuda! Idi kevalam oka hitopadesam mariyu spastamaina pathana grantham (khur'an) matrame
bratiki vunna prativaniki heccarika ceyataniki mariyu satyatiraskarula edala ma adesanni nirupincataniki
emi, variki teliyada? Niscayanga, memu variki vari koraku ma cetulato pasuvulanu srstinci, taruvata vatipai variki yajaman'yam iccamani
Mariyu vatini, variki svadhinaparicamu. Kavuna vatilo konnitipai varu svari cestaru, marikonnitini (vati mansanni) varu tintaru
mariyu vatilo variki enno prayojanalu mariyu paniyalu (palu) unnayi. Ayina, varenduku krtajnatalu cuparu
mariyu varu allah nu vadali, itarulanu aradhya daivaluga cesukunnaru. Bahusa vari valana tamaku sahayam dorakutundemonane asato
varu (a daivalu), tamakelanti sahaya ceyaleru. Ayina! Viru (satyatiraskarulu) vari (a daivala) koraku sain'yam madiriga sarvasannad'dhulai unnaru
kavuna (o muham'mad!) Vari matalu ninnu badhimpanivvaradu. Vastavaniki! Maku, varu dacevi mariyu velibuccevi anni baga telusu
emi? Manavudu erugada? Niscayanga, memu atanini viryabinduvuto srstincamani? Ayina! Atadu bahiranga pratyarthiga tayarayyadu
mariyu atadu maku polikalu kalpistu tana srstine maralipoyadu. Atadu ila antadu: "Krsincipoyina i emukalanu tirigi evadu bratikincagaladu
ila anu: "Modata vatini puttincina ayane, malli vatini bratikistadu. Mariyu ayanaku, prati danini srstince jnanamundi
ayane paccani cettu nundi mi koraku agnini puttincevadu, taruvata miru dani nundi mantanu veligincukuntaru
emi? Akasalanu mariyu bhumini srstincagalavadu, vati lanti vatini marala srstincaleda? Enduku ceyaledu! Ayane sarvasrstikarta, sarvajnudu
niscayanga, ayana vidhanamemitante! Ayana edaina ceyadalacu kunnappudu danito: "Ayipo!" Ani antadu, ante! Adi ayipotundi
endukante! Sarvalopalaku atitudaina ayana (allah) cetilo pratidaniki sambandhincina sarvadhikaralu unnayi mariyu miranta ayana vaipunake maralimpabadataru
varusaga barulu tiri nilucunna vari (daivadutala) saksiga
Meghalanu nadipince vari (daivadutala) saksiga
i upadesanni (khur'an nu, allah daggari nundi manavulaku) tecce vari (daivadutala) saksiga
niscayanga, mi aradhya daivam kevalam ayana (allah) okkade
akasalu mariyu bhumi mariyu vati madhyanunna vati prabhuvu mariyu suryodaya (turpu) sthalalaku prabhuvu
niscayanga, memu bhulokaniki daggari akasanni naksatra samudayalato alankarincamu
mariyu dhikkari ayina prati saitan nundi kapadataniki
ika varu (saitan lu), unnata sthanalalo unna nayakula (daivadutala) matalu vinaleru mariyu varu prati dikku nundi tarumabadutu untaru
(endukante) varu (saitan lu) bahiskarinca baddaru. Mariyu variki nirantaramaina siksa undi
kani, evadaina (e saitanaina), deninaina eguravesukoni potunnatlaite, mande agnijvala atanini vembadistundi
ayite varini adagindi: "Emi? Varu (manavulu) drdhamaina srsta! Leka, memu srstincindi (i srsti drdhamainada?" Niscayanga, memu varini jigata matti (tinillajib) to srstincamu
vastavaniki, nivaite ascaryapadutunnavu, kani varu egatali cestunnaru
mariyu variki upadesamiccinapudu, varu danini svikarincaru
mariyu varoka sanketanni cusinappudu, danini egatali cestaru
mariyu varila antaru: "Idi spastamaina mantrajalam matrame
emiti? Memu maraninci mattiga, emukaluga (astipanjaranga) maripoyina taruvata kuda marala sajivuluga lepabadatama
emiti? Mariyu purvikulaina ma tatamuttatalu kudana
varito ila anu: "Avunu! Appudu miru adhamamaina varu avutaru
niscayanga, adi oka pedda dhvani matrame (rendava baka), appudu varu (leci) custu undipotaru
mariyu varu ila antaru: "Ayyo! Ma daurbhagyam! Ide a tirpudinam
(Appudu varito ila anabadutundi): "Miru abad'dhamani tiraskaristu unde n'yayavicarana dinam ide
(daivadutalato ila anabadutundi): "A durmargulanu samavesaparacandi! Mariyu vari sahavasulanu mariyu varu aradhistu unna varini
allah nu kadani - taruvata varandariki prajvalince narakagni marganni cupandi
mariyu varini akkada nilabettandi. Vastavaniki varini prasnincavalasi undi
mikemaindi? Miru parasparam enduku sahayam cesukovatam ledu
ala kadu! A roju varu tamanu tamu allah ku appagincukuntaru
mariyu varu okari vaipunaku marokaru marali ila prasnincukuntaru
kondaru antaru: "Miru ma vaddaku (mam'malni mosagincataniki) ma kudivaipu nundi vaccevaru
itarulu ila javabistaru: "Ala kadu, mi antata mire visvasincevaru kadu
maku mipai elanti adhikaram undedi kadu. Ala kadu! Mire talabirusutanam cupevaru
kavuna, ippudu mana prabhuvu vakku manapai purti ayyindi. Niscayanga manamanta (siksanu) ruci cudagalamu
kavuna memu mim'malni tappu darilo padavesamu, niscayanga memu kuda margabhrastulamai untimi
appudu niscayanga, varandaru a roju siksalo bhagasvamulavutaru
niscayanga, memu aparadhulato ide vidhanga pravartistamu
vastavaniki, varito: "Allah tappa maroka aradhyadaivam ledu." Ani annappudu, varu darahankaram cupevaru
mariyu varu ila anevaru: "Emiti? Memu oka piccikavi koraku ma aradhya daivalanu tyajincala
vastavaniki, atanu (muham'mad) satyanni tisukoni vaccadu. Mariyu atanu (tanaku purvam vaccina) pravaktalanu satyavantulani dhrvaparacadu
niscayanga, miru badhakaramaina siksanu ruci cudagalaru
mariyu miku, miru cestu undina karmalaku tagina phalitam tappa, maremi ivvabadadu
Ennukobadina allah dasulaku tappa
alanti vari koraku variki telisi unna jivanopadhi undi
anni rakala phalalu. Mariyu varu adarincabadataru
parama sukhalu gala svargavanalalo
asanala mida okarikokaru edureduruga kurconi untaru
vari madhya pravahince celamala nundi, paniyapu (madhu) patralu trippabadutuntayi
adi tellaga (merisipotu) trage variki ento rucikaramainadiga untundi
dani valla variki elanti badha kalugadu mariyu varu tama telivini pogottukoru
mariyu vari daggara, silavatulaina tama cupulanu nigrahincukune, andamaina kallu gala strilu untaru
varu dacabadina grudlavale (komalanga) untaru
appudu varu okari vaipu kokaru marali, parasparam ila prasnincukuntaru
varilo okadantadu: "Vastavaniki (bhulokanlo) nakoka snehitudu (kharinun) undevadu
atadu nannu ila adigevadu: Emi? Nivu kuda (punarut'thanam) nijamenani nam'mevarilo okadiva
emi? Manam canipoyi mattiga emukaluga mari poyina taruvata kuda niscayanga manaku pratiphalamanedi untunda
atadu inka ila antadu: "Emi? Miru atadini cudadalacukunnara
taruvata atadu tongi cusi, atadini (tana purva snehitunni) bhagabhaga mande narakagni madhyalo custadu
atadito (a snehitunito), atadu antadu: "Allah saksiga! Nivu nannu nasanam cesi undevadive
okavela na prabhuvu anugrahame lekunnatlayite! Nenu kuda (narakaniki) hajaru ceyabadina varilo ceri poyevadini
(taruvata a svargavasi tana sahacarulato antadu): "Emi? Ika manam marala canipomu kada
mana modati (bhuloka) maranam tappa! Manaku ika elanti siksa padadu kada
niscayanga, ide a goppa saphalyam (vijayam)
ilanti (sthanam) pondataniki patupade varu patu padali
emi? Ilanti atithyam melainada? Leka jamudu phalapu atithyama
Niscayanga, memu danini, durmargula koraku oka pariksaga cesamu
niscayanga, adi narakapu adugu bhagam nundi molice oka cettu
dani moggalu saitanula talala vale untayi
niscayanga, varu dani nunce tintaru mariyu danitone tama kadupulu nimpukuntaru
taruvata niscayanga, dani mida variki tragataniki salasala kage paniyam matrame untundi
a taruvata niscayanga, vari maralimpu kevalam bhagabhaga mande narakagni vaipunake avutundi
niscayanga, appudu varu tama tandritatalu, margabhrastatvanlo undevarani kanugontaru
mariyu tamu kuda vari adugu jadalanu anusarincataniki tvarapadutu undevaramani
mariyu vastavaniki vari purvikulu kuda cala mandi margabhrastulugane undevaru
mariyu vastavaniki memu vari vaddaku heccarika ceyataniki (sandesaharulanu) pampi unnamu
ika cudu! Heccarika ceyabadina vari paryavasanam ela undindo
ennukobadina allah dasulaku tappa
mariyu vastavanga, nuh mam'malni vedukunnadu. Endukante, memu (prarthanalaku) pratyuttaramicce varilo sarvottamulamu
mariyu memu atanini mariyu atani kutumbam varini maha vipattu (jalapralayam) nundi kapadamu
mariyu atani santati varini matrame migili undetatlu cesamu
mariyu taruvata vacce varilo atani kirtini (peru pratisthanu) nilipamu
sarvalokalalo nuh ku santi kalugu gaka (salam)
niscayanga, memu sajjanulaku i vidhanga pratiphalam istu untamu
niscayanga, atanu ma visvasulaina dasulaloni vadu
taruvata memu itarulanu munci vesamu
mariyu niscayanga, atanini anusarincina varilo ibrahim okadu
atanu tana prabhuvu sannidhyaniki nirmala hrdayanto vacci
atanu tana tandri mariyu tana jati varito ila annadu: "Miru denini aradhistunnaru
Emi? Miru allah nu vadali mithya (butaka) daivalanu (aradhinca) gorutunnara
ayite sarvalokala prabhuvunu gurinci mi abhiprayamemiti
a taruvata, atanu naksatrala vaipuku tana drsti sarincadu
appudu atanu ila annadu: "Niscayanga, na arogyam baguledu
kavuna varu atanini vadali petti vellipoyaru
taruvata atanu mellaga vari devatala (vigrahala) daggariki velli ila annadu: "Miru tinatam ledemiti
mikemaindi? Mirenduku matladaru
taruvata atanu vati vaddaku velli tana kudicetito vatini pagula gottadu
appudu, varu (prajalu) atani daggaraku tvaratvaraga vaccaru
appudu (ibrahim) varito annadu: "Emi? Miru cekkina vatine miru aradhistara
vastavaniki, mim'malni mariyu miru (cekki) cesina vatini srstincindi allah ye kada
varu (parasparam ila ceppukunnaru): "Itani koraku oka (agni) gundam nirminci, taruvata itanini a bhagabhaga mande agnilo padaveyandi
kavuna, varu ataniki virud'dhanga pannagalu pannaru, kani memu varini kincaparacamu
mariyu atanu (ibrahim) annadu: "Niscayanga, nenu na prabhuvu (tisukoni velle) vaipunaku vellipotanu. Ayane naku margadarsakatvam cestadu
(atanu ila prarthincadu): "O na prabhu! Naku sadvartanudaina (kumarunni) prasadincu
kavuna memu ataniki sahanasiludaina kumaruni subhavarta niccamu

a baludu ataniki toduga srama ceyagala vayas'suku cerukunnappudu, atanu (ibrahim) annadu: "O na kumara! Vastavaniki nenu ninnu bali (jibah) cestunnatluga kalalo cusanu, ika ni salaha emito ceppu!" Atanu (ismayil) annadu: "O nanna! Niku ivvabadina ajnanu neravercu, allah korite nivu nannu sahanasiluniga pondagalavu
A taruvata variddaru ayana (allah) ajnanu neravercataniki sid'dha paddaru. Mariyu atanu (ibrahim) atanini (ismayil nu) nudutipai borla parundabettadu
mariyu memu atanini pilustu ila annamu: "O ibrahim
vastavanga, nivu kalana nijam cesi cupincavu!" Niscayanga, memu sajjanulaku ilanti pratiphalamistamu
niscayanga, idoka spastamaina (kathina) pariksa
mariyu memu ataniki (ismayil ku) baduluga oka goppa balini pariharanga iccamu
mariyu taruvata vacce taralalo atani kirtini nilipamu
ibrahim ku santi kalugu gaka (salam)
i vidhanga memu sajjanulaku pratiphalamistamu
niscayanga, atanu (ibrahim) visvasincina ma dasulaloni vadu
mariyu memu ataniki is hakh yokka subhavartanu iccamu, atanu oka sadvartanudaina pravakta
mariyu memu atanini (ibrahim nu) mariyu is hakh nu anugrahincamu. Mariyu vari santatilo kondaru sajjanulunde varu. Marikondaru tamaku tamu spastanga an'yayam cesukunnavaru kuda unnaru
mariyu vastavaniki, memu musa mariyu harun lanu anugrahincamu
mariyu memu variddarini mariyu vari jati varini maha vipattu nundi vimukti kaligincamu
mariyu memu variki sahayam cesamu, kabatti varu vijayam pondina varayyaru
mariyu variddariki (manci cedulanu) spastaparice granthanni prasadincamu
mariyu variddariki rjumargam vaipunaku margadarsakatvam cesamu
mariyu a taruvata tarala varilo variddari gurinci manci kirtini nilipamu
musa mariyu harun laku santi kalugu gaka (salam)
niscayanga, i vidhanga memu sajjanulaku pratiphalamistamu
niscayanga variddaru, visvasulaina ma dasulaloni varu
mariyu niscayanga, ilyas kuda ma sandesaharulalo okadu
Atanu tana jati varito ila annappudu: "Emi? Miku daivabhiti leda
emi? Miru ba'al (ane vigrahanni) aradhistu sarvottamudaina srstikartanu vadali pedutunnara
allah ye mi prabhuvu! Mariyu mi purvikulaina mi tatamuttatala prabhuvu kada
kani varu atanini (ilyas nu) asatyavadudani tiraskarincaru, kabatti varu tappakunda (siksa koraku) hajaru ceyabadataru
ennukobadina allah dasulu tappa
taruvata vacce taralalo atani kirtini (peru pratisthanu) nilipamu
il yasin ku santi kalugu gaka (salam)
niscayanga, sajjanulaku memu i vidhanga pratiphalamistamu
niscayanga, atanu visvasulaina ma dasulaloni vadu
mariyu niscayanga lut kuda memu pampina sandesaharulalo okadu
eppudaite memu atanini mariyu atani kutumbam varinandarini raksincamo
musalame (atani bharya) tappa - ame venuka undipoye varilo ceripoyindi
a taruvata migata varinandarini nirmulincamu
mariyu vastavaniki, mirippudu vari (sithila) prantala miduga udayapu velallo prayanistu untaru
mariyu ratrulalo kuda! Ayina miru artham cesukolera
mariyu niscayanga, yunus kuda memu pampina sandesaharulaloni vadu
atanu nindu padava vaipuku parigettinappudu
akkada citilalo palgonnadu, kani odipoyadu
a pidapa atanini oka pedda cepa mringindi; endukante atanu nindar'hudu
appudatanu, (allah) pavitratanu koniyade variloni vadu kakapoyinatlaite
dani (cepa) kadupulo punarut'thana dinam varaku undi poyevadu
a pidapa memu atanini anarogya sthitilo, oka digambara maidananlo padavesamu
mariyu atanipai oka anapa jati tiganu molipincamu
mariyu atanini oka laksa leda antakante ekkuva mandi (prajala) vaddaku pampamu
Varu visvasincaru, kavuna memu oka nirnita kalam varaku varini sukhasantosalu anubhavincaniccamu
ayite varini ila adugu: "Emi? Ni prabhuvukaite kumartelu mariyu vari koraku kumarula
leka memu devadutalanu striluga puttincama? Mariyu varu daniki saksula
ala kadu! Niscayanga, varu (khuraisulu) tama butakapu nam'makala adharanga antunnaru
allah ku santanamundi!"Ani mariyu varu niscayanga, abad'dhaladutunnaru
ayana (allah) kumartelanu - kumarulaku baduluga -ennukunnada
mikemayindi? Mirelanti nirnayalu cestunnaru
emi? Miru grahincalera
leka! Mi vadda edaina spastamaina pramanam unda
miru satyavantule ayite mi granthanni tisukurandi
mariyu varu, ayana (allah) mariyu jinnatula madhya bandhutvam kalpincaru. Kani vastavaniki jinnatulaku telusu, tamu ayana (allah) mundu (lekka koraku) hajaru ceyabadatamani
varu kalpince visayalaku allah atitudu (parama pavitrudu)
ennukobadina allah dasulu tappa
ika niscayanga, miru mariyu mi aradhyadaivalu (kalisi)
evvadini kuda, dustakaryalu ceyataniki puri kolupaleru
bhagabhaga mande narakagnilo kali ponunna vadini tappa
(daivadutalu ila antaru): "Mariyu malo okkadu kuda tana sthanam niyamimpa badakunda ledu
mariyu niscayanga, memu kuda (ayananu prarthincataniki) varusalu diri nilucuntamu
mariyu niscayanga, memu kuda ayana pavitratanu koniyade varame
mariyu (satyatiraskarulu) ila antu undevaru
okavela ma purvikula nundi maku ilanti bodhana labhinci unte
memu kuda, allah yokka ennukunna, bhaktulamai undevaramu
kani, varippudu dinini (i khur'an nu) tiraskaristunnaru. Ika tvaralone varu telusu kuntaru
Mariyu vastavaniki ma dasulaina, memu pampina sandesaharula visayanlo ma nirnayam jarigindi
niscayanga, varu sahayam (vijayam) pondutarani
mariyu niscayanga, ma sainikule tappaka vijayam pondutarani
kavuna nivu varini (satyatiraskarulanu) kontakalam vadalipettu
mariyu varini custu undu. Ika tvaralone varu kuda (tama paryavasananni) cudagalaru
emi? Varu ma siksa koraku tondara pedutunnara
kani, adi vari inti prangananlo diginappudu, heccarincabadina variki adi durbharamaina udayam kagaladu
kavuna nivu prastutaniki varini vadali pettu
mariyu custu undu. Ika tvaralone varu kuda (tama paryavasananni) cudagalaru
ni prabhuvu sarvalopalaku atitudu; sarvasaktimantudaina prabhuvu, vari kalpanalaku atitudu
mariyu sandesaharulandariki santi kalugugaka (salam)
mariyu sarvastotralaku ar'hudaina allah ye samasta lokalaku prabhuvu
sad. Mariyu hitabodhato nindivunna i khur'an saksiga
vastavaniki, satyanni tiraskarincina varu ahankaranlo mariyu virodhanlo padivunnaru
variki purvam gatincina enno taralanu memu nasanam cesamu. Appudu varu mora pettukosagaru, kani appudu variki dani nundi tappincukune samayam lekapoyindi
mariyu varini heccarincevadu, tamalo nunce ravatam cusi varu ascaryapaddaru! Mariyu satyatiraskarulu ila annaru: "Itadu mantrikudu, asatyavadi
emi? Itanu (i pravakta) daivalandarini, oke aradhyadaivanga cesada? Niscayanga idi ento vicitramaina visayam
mariyu vari nayakulu ila anasagaru: "Padandi! Miru mi daivala (aradhana) mida sthiranga undandi." Niscayanga, indulo (miku virud'dhanga) edo uddesimpabadi undi
ilanti visayanni memu itivali kalapu matanlo vini undaledu. Idi kevalam kalpana matrame
Emi? Ma andarilonu, kevalam itanipainane, i hitabodha avatarimpa jeyabadinda? Vastavaniki varu na hitabodhanu gurinci sansayanlo padi vunnaru. Ala kadu, varu inka (na) siksanu ruci cudaledu
leka vari daggara sarvasaktudu, sarvapradudu ayina ni prabhuvu yokka karunya nidhulu unnaya
leka! Akasalu mariyu bhumi mariyu vati madhya unna samastam mida variki samrajyadhipatyam unda? Ala ayite varini tama sadhanalato paiki (akasaloki) ekkamanu
intaku mundu odincabadina sain'yala vale, oka vargam viridi kuda untundi
viriki purvam nuh mariyu ad (jati) varu mariyu mekula phir'aun jatula varu satyanni tiraskarincaru
mariyu samud mariyu lut jatula varu mariyu ay kah (mad yan) vasulu andaru ilanti vargalaku cendinavare
ika virilo e okkaru pravaktalanu asatyavadulani tiraskarincakunda undaledu, kavuna na siksa anivaryamayyindi
mariyu virandaru kevalam oka garjana (say ha) koraku matrame eduru custunnaru, daniki elanti nilupudala undadu
mariyu varu: "O ma prabhu! Lekka dinaniki munde ma bhagam maku tondaraga icci veyyi." Ani antaru
(o muham'mad!) Vari matala yedala nivu sahanam vahincu mariyu balavantudaina, ma dasudu davud nu jnapakam cesuko. Niscayanga, atanu ellappudu pascattapanto (allah vaipunaku) maralutu undevadu
niscayanga, memu parvatalanu atanito batu sayantram mariyu udayam ma pavitratanu koniyadutu undetatlu cesamu
mariyu paksulu kuda gumikudevi. Anta kalasi ayana (allah) vaipuku maralevaru
mariyu memu atani samrajyanni patistaparicamu mariyu memu ataniki vivekanni mariyu tiruguleni tirpu ceyadanlo, nerparitananni prasadincamu
Mariyu tagavuladukoni vaccina a iddari varta niku cerinda? Varu goda ekki atani prarthana gadiloki vaccaru

varu davud vaddaku vaccinapudu, atanu varini cusi bediri poyadu. Varannaru: "Bhayapadaku! Memiddaram pratyarthulam, malo okadu marokaniki an'yayam cesadu. Kavuna nivu ma madhya n'yayanga tirpu ceyyi. Mariyu niti miri naduvaku, maku saraina margam vaipunaku margadarsakatvam ceyyi

vastavaniki, itadu na sodarudu, itani vadda tombhai tom'midi ada gorrelunnayi. Mariyu na daggara kevalam oke okka ada gorre undi, ayina itadu antunnadu: 'Dinini nakivvu.' Mariyu tana matala nerpulota nannu vasaparacukuntunnadu

(davud) annadu: "Vastavanga, ni adagorrenu tana gorrelalo kalupukovataniki adigi, itadu nipai an'yayam cestunnadu. Mariyu vastavaniki, cala mandi bhagasthulu okari kokaru an'yayam cesukuntu untaru, visvasinci satkaryalu cesevaru tappa! Kani atuvanti varu kondaru matrame!" Vastavaniki memu atanini (davud nu) pariksistunnamani atanu artham cesukunnadu. Kabatti tana prabhuvunu ksamapana vedukunnadu. Mariyu sastangam (sajda)lo padipoyadu mariyu pascattapanto (allah vaipuku) maraladu
appudu memu atanini (a tappunu) ksamincamu. Mariyu niscayanga, ma vadda ataniki sannihityam mariyu manci sthanam kuda unnayi

(Memu atanito ila annamu): "O davud! Niscayanga, memu ninnu bhumilo uttaradhikariga niyamincamu. Kavuna nivu prajala madhya n'yayanga tirpu ceyyi mariyu ni manokanksalanu anusarincaku, endukante avi ninnu allah margam nundi tappistayi." Niscayanga, evaraite allah margam nundi tappipotaro, variki lekka dinamuna maraci poyina dani phalitanga, kathinamaina siksa padutundi

mariyu memu i akasanni mariyu i bhumini mariyu vati madhya unna dannanta vrthaga srstincaledu! Idi satyanni tiraskarincina vari bhrama matrame. Kavuna atti satyatiraskarulaku narakagni badha padanunnadi
emi? Memu visvasinci, satkaryalu cesevarini bhumilo kallolam rekettince varito samanuluga cestama? Leka memu daivabhiti galavarini dustulato samanuluga cestama

(o muham'mad!) Memu ento subhavantamaina i granthanni (khur'an nu) nipai avatarimpa jesamu. Prajalu dini sucanalanu (ayat lanu) gurinci yocincalani mariyu bud'dhimantulu dini nundi hitabodha grahincalani
mariyu memu davud ku sulaiman nu prasadincamu. Atanu uttama dasudu! Niscayanga, atanu ellappudu ma vaipunaku pascattapanto maralutu undevadu
okaroju sayankalam atani mundu melu jati, vadi gala gurralu pravesapettabadinappudu
atanu annadu: "Ayyo! Vastavanga nenu na prabhuvu smaranaku baduluga i sampadanu (gurralanu) premincanu." Civaraku (suryudu) kanumarugai poyadu
(atanu inka ila annadu): "Vatini na vaddaku tirigi tisukurandi." Taruvata atanu vati pikkalanu mariyu medalanu nimarasagadu
mariyu vastavaniki memu sulaiman nu pariksaku guri cesamu mariyu atani sinhasanampai oka kalebaranni padavesamu, appudatanu pascattapanto ma vaipunaku maraladu
Atanu ila prarthincadu: "O na prabhu! Nannu ksamincu, na taruvata marevvariki labhincanatuvanti samrajyanni naku prasadincu. Niscayanga, nive sarvapradudavu
appudu memu galini ataniki vasa paracamu. Adi atani ajnanusaranga, atadu korina vaipunaku taginatluga mellaga vicedi
mariyu saitanulalo (jinnatulalo) nundi kuda rakarakala kattadalu nirmince vatini mariyu samudranlo munigi (mutyalu tise) vatini (ataniki vasa paraci unnamu)
marikonni sankellato bandhimpabadinavi kuda undevi
(allah atanito annadu): "Idi niku ma kanuka, kavuna nivu dinini (itarulaku) iccina, leka nive uncukunna, nito elanti lekka tisukobadadu
mariyu niscayanga, ataniki ma sannihityam mariyu uttama gamyasthanam unnayi
mariyu ma dasudu ayyub nu gurinci prastavincu; atanu tana prabhuvuto ila morapettukunnadu: "Niscayanga saitan nannu apadaku mariyu siksaku guri cesadu
(memu atanito annamu): "Ni kalunu nela mida kottu. Adigo calla (niti celima)! Nivu snanam ceyataniki mariyu tragutakunu
mariyu memu atani kutumbam varini mariyu varito batu, vari vanti varini ma karunato ataniki tirigi iccamu mariyu bud'dhimantulaku idi oka hitabodha

(allah atanito annadu): "Oka pullala kattanu ni cetiloki tisikoni danito (ni bharyanu) kottu mariyu ni ottunu bhangaparacukoku." Vastavaniki, memu atanini ento sahanasiluniga pondamu. Atanu uttama dasudu! Niscayanga, ellapudu ma vaipunaku pascattapanto maralutu undevadu
mariyu ma dasulaina ibrahim, is hakh mariyu ya'akhub lanu jnapakam cesuko! Varu goppa karyasiluru mariyu duradrsti galavaru
Niscayanga, memu varini oka visista gunam karananga ennukunnamu, adi vari paraloka cintana
mariyu niscayanga, ma drstilo varu ennukobadina uttama (punya) purusulaloni varu
mariyu ismayil, al yasa mariyu jul kipl nu kuda jnapakam cesuko. Mariyu varandaru ennukonabadina uttama purusulaloni varu
idi oka prastavana. Mariyu niscayanga! Daivabhiti galavariki uttama gamyasthanam undi
sasvatamaina svargavanalu, vati dvaralu vari koraku teruvabadi untayi
andulo varu dindlanu anukoni kurconi; andulo varu aneka phalalanu mariyu paniyalanu adugutu untaru
mariyu vari daggara samavayaskulu mariyu tama cupulanu vari korake pratyekincukone silavatulaina strilu untaru
lekkadinam koraku mito (daivabhiti galavarito) ceyabadina vagdanam ide
niscayanga, ide memicce jivanopadhi. Daniki taruguledu
ide (visvasulaku labhincedi). Mariyu niscayanga, talabirusutanam gala dustulaku ati cedda gamyasthanam untundi
narakam - varandulo kalutaru. Enta badhakaramaina virama (nivasa) sthalamu
ide (dustulaku labhincedi), kavuna varu dani ruci custaru; salasalakage niru mariyu cimu
inka ilantive anekam untayi
idoka dalam, mi vaipunaku troyabadutu vastunnadi. Variki elanti svagatam ledu! Niscayanga, varu narakagnilo kalutaru
(satyatiraskarulu tamanu margam tappincina varito) antaru: "Ayite miku kuda svagatam ledu kada! I paryavasananni ma munduku teccina varu mire kada! Enta cedda nivasa sthalamu
varu inka ila antaru: "O ma prabhu! Ma yeduta dinini (narakanni) teccina vaniki rettimpu narakagni siksanu vidhincu
inka varu ila antaru: "Makemayindi? Manam ceddavariga encina varu ikkada manaku kanabadatam ledemiti
Manam urike varini egatali cesama? Leda varu manaku kanumarugayyara
niscayanga, ide nijam! Narakavasulu ilage vaduladukuntaru
(o muham'mad!) Varito ila anu: "Vastavaniki nenu heccarincevadanu matrame! Allah tappa maroka aradhya daivam ledu! Ayana advitiyudu tana srsti mida sampurna adhikaram galavadu
akasalu, bhumi mariyu vati madhya unna samastaniki prabhuvu, sarvasaktimantudu, ksamasiludu
varito anu: "Idi (i khur'an) oka goppa sandesam
dani nundi miru vimukhulavu tunnaru
(o muham'mad! Ila anu): "Unnata sthanalalo unna mukhyula (devadutala) madhya (adam srsti gurinci) okappudu jarigina vivadam gurinci naku teliyadu
kani adi naku divyajnanam (vahi) dvarane telupabadindi. Vastavaniki, nenu spastanga heccarika cesevanni matrame
ni prabhuvu devadutalato ila anna matanu (jnapakam cesuko): "Nenu mattito oka manisini srstincabotunnanu
ika eppudaite, nenu atani srstini purti cesi atanilo na (taraphu nundi) atmanu (jivanni) udutano appudu, miru atani mundu sastangam (sajda)lo padipondi
appudu devadutalandaru kalasi ataniki sajda cesaru
okka iblis tappa! Atadu garvitudayyadu mariyu satyatiraskarulalo kalisi poyadu

(allah) ila annadu: "O iblis! Nenu na rendu cetulato srstincina vaniki sastangam (sajda) ceyakunda ninnu apindi emiti? Nivu garvitudavai poyava! Leda ninnu, nivu unnata sreniki cendina vadavanukunnava
(iblis) annadu: "Nenu atani kante sresthudanu. Nivu nannu agnito srstincavu mariyu atanini mattito srstincavu
(allah) annadu: "Ika ikkadi nundi vellipo! Niscayanga nivu bhrastudavu
Mariyu niscayanga, tirpudinam varaku nipai na sapam (bahiskaram) untundi
(appudu iblis) ila manavi cesukunnadu: "O na prabhu! Mrtulu tirigi lepabade dinam varaku naku vyavadhinivvu
(allah) selaviccadu: "Sare! Niku vyavadhi ivvabadutondi
a niyamita dinapu a gaduvu vacce varaku
(iblis) annadu: "Ni sakti saksiga nenu varandarini tappu dari pattistanu
varilo nundi nivu ennukunna ni dasulni tappa
(allah) annadu: "Ayite satyam ide! Mariyu nenu satyam palukutunnanu
nivu mariyu varilo nundi ninnu anusarince varandarito nenu narakanni nimputanu
(o pravakta!) Varito anu: "Nenu dini (i sandesam) koraku mi nundi, elanti pratiphalanni adagatam ledu mariyu nenu vancakulaloni vadanu kanu
idi (i khur'an) samasta lokala varandariki kevalam oka jnapika (hitabodha)
mariyu acira kalanlone dini uddesanni (vartanu) miru tappaka telusukuntaru
i grantha (khur'an) avatarana sarvasaktimantudu, maha vivekavantudaina allah taraphu nundi jarigindi
(o muham'mad!) Niscayanga memu i granthanni, satyanto nipai avatarimpajesamu. Kavuna nivu allah ne aradhistu ni bhaktini kevalam ayana korake pratyekincuko

vinandi! Bhakti kevalam allah koraku matrame pratyekincabadindi! Ika ayananu vadali itarulanu sanraksakuluga cesukune varu (ila antaru): "Varu mam'malni allah sannidhyaniki cercutarani matrame memu varini aradhistunnamu!" Niscayanga allah varilo unna bhedabhiprayalaku taginatluga vari madhya tirpu cestadu. Niscayanga, allah asatyavadiki, krtaghnuniki margadarsakatvam ceyadu

Okavela allah evarinaina kumaruniga cesukodaliste, tana srstilo tanu korina vanini ennukoni undevadu. Ayana sarvalopalaku atitudu. Ayana allah! Advitiyudu, tana srsti mida sampurna adhikaram (prabalyam) galavadu

ayana akasalanu mariyu bhumini satyanto srstincadu. Ayana ratrini pagati mida cuttutunnadu. Mariyu pagatini ratri mida cuttutunnadu. Suryunni mariyu candrunni niyamabad'dhuluga cesi uncadu. Vatilo prati okkati oka nirnita kalanlo (nirnita paridhilo) payanistu unnayi. Vinandi! Ayana, sarvasaktimantudu, ksamincevadu

ayana mim'malni oke prani (adam) nundi srstincadu. Taruvata atani nundi atani janta (jauj) nu puttincadu. Mariyu mi koraku enimidi jatala (ada maga) sisuvulanu puttincadu. Ayana mim'malni mi tallula garbhalalo mudu cikati teralalo oka rupam taruvata maroka rupanni iccadu. Ayane allah! Mi prabhuvu. Visvadhipatyam ayanade. Ayana tappa maroka aradhya devudu ledu. Alantappudu miru ela (satyam nundi) tappincabadutunnaru

okavela miru satyanni tiraskariste, niscayanga, allah mi akkaraleni vadu. Mariyu ayana tana dasulu satyatiraskara vaikharini avalambincadanni ista padadu. Mariyu miru krtajnulainatlayite ayana mi patla ento santosapadatadu. Mariyu baruvu mosevadu evvadu itarula baruvunu moyadu. Civaraku mirandariki, mi prabhuvu vaipunake marala valasi undi! Appudu ayana, miru ememi cestu undevaro miku teliyajestadu. Niscayanga ayanaku hrdayalalo unna visayalanni baga telusu

Manavuniki edaina kastam kaliginappudu atadu pascattapanlo tana prabhuvu vaipunaku marali ayananu vedukuntadu. Taruvata ayana (allah) ataniki tana anugrahanni prasadinci nappudu, atadu purvam denini gurinci vedukuntu undevado danini maracipotadu. Mariyu allah ku sati kalpinci, (itarulanu) ayana margam nundi tappistadu. (Alanti vanito) ila anu: "Nivu, ni satyatiraskara vaikharito konta kalam santosapadu. Niscayanga, nivu narakavasulloni vadavavutavu

emi? Evadaite srad'dhato ratri ghadiyalalo sastangam (sajda) cestu mariyu nilici (namaj) cestu, paraloka (jivita)munu gurinci bhayapadutu, tana prabhuvu karunyanni asistu untado! (Alanti vadu, ala ceyani vadito samanuda)? Vari nadugu: "Emi? Vijnanulu mariyu ajnanulu sarisamanulu kagalara? Vastavaniki bud'dhimantule hitabodha svikaristaru

(o muham'mad!) Allah ila selavistunnadani) anu: "O visvasincina na dasulara! Mi prabhuvu nandu bhayabhaktulu kaligi undandi. Evaraite i lokanlo satpurusulai untaro (variki paralokanlo) melu jarugutundi. Mariyu allah bhumi cala visalamainadi. Niscayanga, sahanam vahincina variki lekka lenanta pratiphalam ivvabadutundi
(o muham'mad! Inka) ila anu: "Niscayanga, nenu allah nu matrame aradhistu, na bhaktini kevalam ayana korake pratyekincukovalani ajnapincabaddanu
mariyu nenu andari kante mundu (allah ku) vidheyudanu (muslim) ayi undali" ani kuda ajnapincabaddanu
(inka) ila anu: "Okavela nenu na prabhuvuku avidheyudanaite a maha dinavu siksaku guri avutanani bhayapadutunnanu
(inka) ila anu: "Nenu kevalam allah ne aradhistu na bhaktini (aradhananu) kevalam ayana korake pratyekincukuntanu

Kavuna miru ayananu vadali miku istamaina varini aradhincandi!" Inka ila anu: "Punarut'thana dinamuna tamaku tamu mariyu tama kutumbam variki nastam kaligincukunna vare niscayanga nastapadda varu. Vastavaniki ade spastamaina nastam

varini, varipai nundi agni jvalalu kram'mukuntayi mariyu vari krindi nundi (agni jvalalu) kram'mukuntayi. I vidhanga, allah tana dasulanu bhayapedutunnadu: "O na dasulara! Na patla matrame bhayabhaktulu kaligi undandi
mariyu evaraite kalpita daivalanu (tagut lanu) tyajinci, vatini aradhincakunda, pascattapanto allah vaipunaku maralutaro! Variki subhavarta undi. Kavuna na dasulaku i subhavartanu ivvu
evaraite matanu srad'dhaga vini, anduloni uttamamaina danini anusaristaro! Alanti vare, allah margadarsakatvam pondina varu mariyu alanti vare bud'dhimantulu
emi? Evadini gurinci ayite ayana (allah taraphu nundi) siksa nirnayincabadi undo, vanini nivu narakagnilo nundi bayatiki tiyagalava

kani evaraite tama prabhuvu yedala bhayabhaktulu kaligi unnaro! Vari koraku antastupai antastuga, kattabadina ettaina bhavanalu untayi. Vati krinda selayellu pravahistu untayi. Idi allah vagdanam. Allah tana vagdananni ennadu bhangaparacadu

emi? Niku teliyada? Niscayanga, allah akasam nundi nitini kuripinci, taruvata danini bhumilo utaluga pravahimpa jestunnadani? A taruvata dani valla vividha rangula vrksakotini utpatti cestadu. A taruvata adi endipoyi napudu, nivu danini pasupu ranguga maripovatanni custavu. Civaraku ayana danini pottuga marci vestadu. Niscayanga indulo bud'dhimantulaku hitabodha undi

Emi? E vyakti hrdayannaite allah vidheyata (islam) koraku terustado, atadu tana prabhuvu cupina velugulo nadustu untado (alanti vadu satyatiraskarito samanudu kagalada?) Evari hrdayalaite allah hitopadesam patla kathinamai poyayo, alanti variki vinasam undi. Alanti varu spastamaina margabhrastatvanlo padi unnaru

allah sarvasresthamaina bodhanalanu oka grantha rupanlo avatarimpajesadu. Danilo oke rakamaina vatini (vacanalanu) matimatiki enno vidhaluga (visadikarincadu). Tama prabhuvuku bhayapade vari sariralu (carmalu) danito (a pathananto) gajagaja vanukutayi. Kani taruvata vari carmalu mariyu vari hrdayalu allah dhyanam valana mettabadatayi. Idi allah margadarsakatvam. Ayana dinito tanu korina variki margadarsakatvam cestadu. Mariyu e vyaktini allah margabhrastatvanlo vadalutado, ataniki margadarsakudu evvadu undadu

emi? Punarut'thana dinavu kathinamaina siksanu tana mukhanto kapadu kovalasina vadu (svarganlo pravesincevanito samanuda)? Mariyu (a roju) durmargulato ila anabadutundi: "Miru sampadincina danini ruci cudandi
viriki purvamunna varu kuda (allah sandesalanu) abad'dhalani tiraskarincaru, kabatti varu uhincaleni disa nundi varipai siksa vacci padindi
i vidhanga, allah variki ihaloka jivitanlo kuda avamananni ruci cupadu. Mariyu vari paraloka siksa dini kante ento ghoramainadiga untundi. Varu idi grahiste enta bagundedi
mariyu vastavaniki memu i khur'an lo prajala koraku aneka rakala drstantalu perkonnamu, bahusa varu gunapatham nercukuntarani
arabbi bhasalo unna i khur'an nu, e vidhamaina vakrata lekunda avatarimpa jesamu; bahusa varu daivabhiti kaligi vuntarani

Allah oka drstantam istunnadu: Oka manavudu (banisa) parasparam virodhamunna ento mandi yajamanulaku cedinavadu. Maroka manavudu (banisa) purtiga oke okka yajamaniki cendina vadu, variddari paristhiti samananga untunda? Sarvastotralaku ar'hudu allah matrame! Kani varilo cala mandiki idi teliyadu
(o muham'mad!) Niscayanga, (oka roju) nivu maranistavu mariyu niscayanga varu kuda maranistaru
a taruvata niscayanga, punarut'thana dinamuna miranta mi prabhuvu samaksanlo mi vivadalanu vinnavincukuntaru
